title: Warm prawn and couscous salad
ingredients: ['75g couscous', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '250g cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 red pepper, chopped', '400g raw large prawns', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'pinch dried oregano', '2 to 4 tbsp chopped fresh flat leaf parsley', 'juice of 1 lemon']
